page.title: 03Ship breaking -Inverkeithing
page.content:
The breakers in Inverkeithing have dismantled almost four hundred warships and Navy craft since{1894, including{HMS Nelson}and Aircraft carrier{HMS Formidable.}Situated in the Jamestown area, with jetties in Inverkeithing Bay, the yard provides a major source of employment in Inverkeithing.
Nowadays, the ship's plates are cut by gas equipment and the jetties have cranes which lift loads of up to fifty tons.
One of the oldest ships dismantled here was{HMS Mars,}a sister ship of Nelson's{Victory.
